title: Snacktime: Zelda And Zebra Plants
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Author John Boyne and Jeff the zebra plant take center stage in this edition of snacktime. Also, Ben and Amory realize they share an affinity for... melon ballers?

itunes:title: Snacktime: Zelda And Zebra Plants
itunes:summary: Author John Boyne and Jeff the zebra plant take center stage in this edition of snacktime. Also, Ben and Amory realize they share an affinity for... melon ballers?
itunes:subtitle: The Endless Thread team shares some of the most memorable Reddit posts of late, from a famous author accidentally plagiarizing a beloved video game to Jeff the zebra plant.

media:content.media:description: Christian Capuccino, left, dressed as "Link" and Dayna Austin dressed as "Zelda," pose on Day Two at Comic-Con International on Friday, July 19, 2019, in San Diego, Calif. (Photo by Christy Radecic/Invision/AP)
